sections.title: Enchanting Courtesan (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Enchanting Courtesan class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Enchanting Courtesan)
sections.description: The enchanting courtesan gains no proficiency with any weapons or armor.

sections.title: Covert Spells (Su) (Enchanting Courtesan)
sections.description: Allows the enchanting courtesan to cast divination and enchantment spells without observers noticing, using Bluff and Sleight of Hand checks opposed by Sense Motive and Perception.

sections.title: Enchanting Touch (Su) (Enchanting Courtesan)
sections.description: Allows delivery of divination or enchantment touch spells through intimate contact, imposing a -4 penalty on the target's skill checks to notice the spellcasting.

sections.title: Seducer’s Leverage (Ex) (Enchanting Courtesan)
sections.description: Provides access to an informant network that can determine influence relationships between individuals and organizations, and grants edges in verbal duels.

sections.title: Poison Use (Ex) (Enchanting Courtesan)
sections.description: Grants training with poisons, preventing accidental self-poisoning when applying poison to weapons.

sections.title: Seductive Intuition (Su) (Enchanting Courtesan)
sections.description: Provides a competence bonus to social skills and allows using Sense Motive modifier for Diplomacy and Sleight of Hand against sexually attracted targets.

sections.title: Hidden Spell (Su) (Enchanting Courtesan)
sections.description: Grants circumstance bonuses to spell save DCs and caster level checks against unaware foes, allies, flanked targets, or those denied Dex bonus.

sections.title: Master Poisoner (Ex) (Enchanting Courtesan)
sections.description: Allows changing poison types using Craft (alchemy) and provides bonuses to poison-related crafting checks.

sections.title: Contact Poison Wielder (Ex) (Enchanting Courtesan)
sections.description: Enables wielding contact poison as a melee weapon with touch attacks, concealed with Sleight of Hand, and allows swift action drawing.

sections.title: Deluding Touch (Su) (Enchanting Courtesan)
sections.description: Causes targets who successfully save against enchanting touch or contact poison to potentially remain unaware of the attack attempt.

sections.title: Informative Liaisons (Ex) (Enchanting Courtesan)
sections.description: Establishes contact networks in settlements, allowing taking 20 on Diplomacy to gather information and automatic success on Propaganda checks.

sections.title: Overwhelming Touch (Su) (Enchanting Courtesan)
sections.description: Forces targets to roll twice and take the worse result on saves against spells delivered via enchanting touch.

sections.title: Touch of Ecstasy (Ex) (Enchanting Courtesan)
sections.description: Delivers a touch attack that inflicts ecstatic pleasure, potentially stunning or staggering the target while suppressing pain effects.
